mapper.select: select distinct m.instanceclassguid from ppm_deliverable m, ppm_deliverableitem d where m.deliverableitemguid = d.guid and d.taskguid in ($SUBTASKGUIDLIST$)

select m.guid, m.projectguid, m.deliverableitemguid, m.instanceguid, m.instanceclassguid, m.DATASEQ, x.classguid, x.md_id as id$$, x.md_name as name$$, x.status as status$$, x.classification as classification$$, x.filename as filename$$, x.createtime createtime$$, x.updatetime updatetime$$, x.createuser as createuser$$, x.updateuser as updateuser$$ from ppm_deliverable m, $tablename$ x, ppm_deliverableitem d where m.deliverableitemguid = d.guid and x.guid = m.instanceguid and d.taskguid in ($SUBTASKGUIDLIST$) and m.instanceclassguid = #INSTANCECLASSGUID#
select distinct m.instanceclassguid from ppm_deliverable m where 1 = 1

select m.guid, m.projectguid, m.deliverableitemguid, m.instanceguid, m.instanceclassguid, m.DATASEQ, x.classguid, x.md_id as id$$, x.md_name as name$$, x.status as status$$, x.classification as classification$$, x.filename as filename$$, x.createtime createtime$$, x.updatetime updatetime$$, x.createuser as createuser$$, x.updateuser as updateuser$$ from ppm_deliverable m, $tablename$ x where x.guid = m.instanceguid and m.instanceclassguid = #INSTANCECLASSGUID#
mapper.insert:
insert into ppm_Deliverable (GUID, PROJECTGUID, DELIVERABLEITEMGUID, INSTANCEGUID, INSTANCECLASSGUID, DATASEQ,
createuserguid, createtime, updateuserguid, updatetime) values (#GUID#, #PROJECTGUID#, #DELIVERABLEITEMGUID#, #INSTANCEGUID#, #INSTANCECLASSGUID#, #DATASEQ#,
#CREATEUSERGUID#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#)
mapper.update:
update ppm_Deliverable
PROJECTGUID = #PROJECTGUID#, DELIVERABLEITEMGUID = #DELIVERABLEITEMGUID#, INSTANCEGUID = #INSTANCEGUID#, INSTANCECLASSGUID = #INSTANCECLASSGUID#, DATASEQ = #DATASEQ#, CREATEUSERGUID = #CREATEUSERGUID#,
updatetime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid = #UPDATEUSERGUID# where GUID=#GUID#/>
